author: Alexandra Kelley
title: Ankle monitors ordered for Kentucky residents refusing quarantine after coronavirus exposure | TheHill - The Hill
description: Ankle monitors ordered for Kentucky residents refusing quarantine after coronavirus exposure | TheHill The Hill Kentucky coronavirus: Some residents are refusing to self-isolate to wear ankle monitors CNN Fake drive-thru coronavirus testing sites investigated…
content:
Despite Governor Andy Beshear ordering all Kentucky residents to stay at home to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus, some in Louisville are reportedly refusing to self-quarantine. 
As a response, Jefferson Circuit Court judge Angela Bisig is ordering ank… [+1769 chars]
